titleStmt.title: With Visage as grim as Tartar or Turke
With motions more furious than thrasher at worke
While all in a rage his passion he sets forth
To the Dean of St 08. Patricks thus speaks Serjt 08. B──th

publicationStmt.p: Distributed by Digital Scholarship Services at Lafayette College

lg.l: Thou mountain of satyr as sharp as a rapier
Defile not with me so much innocent paper
For how can you think that I am such a looby
To hear my selfe stiled thus tamely a booby
What blockhead tho' dull as T──────or P──────
But who will cry nameing yṃ such is unmercifull
Yet Since you intended severely to mawl me
Instead of a booby a Fop you might call me
A Coxcomb to be I was ever inclined
And such to have called me all mankind had joyned
But since such an Orator Vilely you handle
I must and I will bring my Action of Scandal
A Subject more wise such an Author might chuse
Yet Listen and hear who it's you abuse
No mortall like me Exerts so much his paws
To puzzle the old & marr the new Laws
Or who Cou'd Command such shocking grimaces
The Hydra himself Cou'd not boast of more faces
My Clients averr no cause the Can loose a
Pleading by one has the head of MedusaNeither T────nor C────can so roar in the house
Yet you have Ioined me to a maggott & louse
Tho' my parts & my reading my looks cannot answer
Yet know that I am a Second Drawcansir
Tho' you are environed with Surprize & rochet
Yet see I have here a knife in my pockett
I got it from Holland as soom you my See
So let us begin & play Sniggar Snee
But hold in my rage & run on no faster
Since an edge tooll Im told often turns on it's master
By dying least wee our professions might wrong
Let us end the dispute with pen & with tongue
For mine I can tell my Experience affords
A torrent of Senseless and unmeaning words
Your Tale of a tub Your gulliver Draper
Have given you sufficiently reason to vapour
Your Wits as an army about you provide
Yet I'll have the Coxcombs & fools of my side
The Witts still are proud to pull down one another
While blockheads will readily Succour a brother
Your Answer the town & shall I expect
Tho' fools shou'd be treated wtḥ Scorn & neglect!W65023D
